member.name: APPCATEGORYINFO
member.summary: Provides application category information to Add/Remove Programs in Control Panel. The structure is used create a complete list of categories for an application publisher.

member.name: APPCATEGORYINFO.pszDescription
member.summary: A pointer to a string containing the display name of the category. This string displays in the Category list in Add/Remove Programs. This string buffer must be allocated using and freed using .

member.name: APPCATEGORYINFO.AppCategoryId
member.summary: A GUID identifying the application category.
